text: 2.10 Mat 5.16, Plp 2.15, Tat 1.3 tap kɨlop si ma dɨnɨgel. Anɨgɨl anɨgɨl gɨtep gɨnɨgel ak nɨm, bɨawl kɨli okok, kɨli bɨ wog gɨñeb chɨn okok gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨl apun tek nep gɨpal agɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, kɨli God bɨ kasɨn gep chɨn ak takaw tep ne agñɨbun ak nɨŋɨd, takaw teplep yɨbɨl ak nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdeb agɨnɨgabal.
